channel.title: Help! Client..!
channel.description:
Help!
I went to the client (gui) then went to the ip changed it to my ip. After that I saved and exited. Went to compile but it said ( The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue... ) Ive had a server before and hosted and everythingwith the same source. The client I deleted and downloaded a new 1 now I cant do this. Is it because I cant compile it?!??
This is the compiler...
@echo off COLOR 02 title Runescape Private Server Compiler- Pwn0r "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
my java is... C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin
Im pretty stupid so i tryed replaceing C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe with C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin but then it said external or interal command wont work or something.
So any help you can give me would be nice.

item.title: Help! Client..!
item.dc:creator: @99strpuremuh 99strpuremuh
item.description:
@99strpuremuh wrote:

Ok ill try it… But where do I find my jdk in that form of jdk1.6.0_14 < thats not my jdk. But where do i find it in that form…

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Client..!
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Just change the JDK version to yours.

“C:\Program Files\Java[b]jdk1.6.0_14[/b]\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java

That JDK version doesn’t match the one you use.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Client..!
item.dc:creator: @99strpuremuh 99strpuremuh
item.description:
@99strpuremuh wrote:

Help!

I went to the client (gui) then went to the ip changed it to my ip.
After that I saved and exited. Went to compile but it said ( The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue… )
Ive had a server before and hosted and everythingwith the same source. The client I deleted and downloaded a new 1 now I cant do this.
Is it because I cant compile it?!??

This is the compiler…

@echo off
COLOR 02
title Runescape Private Server Compiler- Pwn0r
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

my java is… C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin

Im pretty stupid so i tryed replaceing C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe with C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin but then it said external or interal command wont work or something.

So any help you can give me would be nice.
